data.title: English Chapter 3 - Bravo! Amir Agha!
data.meta_description: ENGLISH CHAPTER 3- BRAVO! AMIR AGHA!.docx - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document contains questions and answers about a kite flying competition described in Chapter 3 of The Kite Runner by Khaled Hosseini. Amir feels tired but determined to win as he has cut dozens of kites. He thinks God will help the winds blow in his favor. Amir finally cuts the biggest prize, the blue kite, after taking advantage of a gust. He wants to defeat the blue kite to win the competition and be recognized. The questions also discuss how Amir and Hassan celebrate Amir's victory.
